infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Plantify uses the camera to identify plants and capture photos for your plant collection.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Plantify may use the microphone for plant identification features.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Plantify needs access to your photo library to save plant photos and access existing images for identification.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Plantify uses your location to provide region-specific plant information and care tips.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Plantify may use calendar access to help you schedule plant care reminders and watering schedules.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Plantify may access contacts to help you share plant information and care tips with friends and family.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Plantify may access reminders to help you keep track of plant watering and care schedules.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Plantify may use motion data to enhance plant identification accuracy.
